other_title: 伝説巨神イデオン 発動篇 (Japanese)
plot: The epic conclusion to the Ideon saga, featuring what was meant to be the final 5 episodes of the TV series. The Solo Ship and its crew continue their intense battle with the Buff Clan leading to a final battle that will determine the fate of all life in the universe.
ending_theme: "Cantata Orbis" (カンタータ・オルビス) by Koichi Sugiyama
